ygData.msgSnippet: * Shadow Cat groans and opens her eyes to the bright brilliance of this worlds sun. She blinks them to get herself used to the light once again. She groans

From: "Alten Gould" <beastwarsaddress@...>


* Shadow Cat groans and opens her eyes to the bright brilliance of this 
worlds sun. She blinks them to get herself used to the light once again. She 
groans again and sits up. That blast knocked her to the ground, which 
knocked her out.  She looks around, rubbing her head. She spies Hurricane 
asking Snow Tech to fight, hand to hand. He (hurricane) looked like he had 
been blasted by some sort of explosive, and cold ones at that. She smiled, 
Snow Tech was very defensive about his family.  Just then, a crackling came 
from her and Snow Tech's com-link. Iron Raptor wanted the to seize fire and 
to go to her. She sighed, she hoped Snow Tech heard..*

* Snow Tech saw Hurricane throw down his weapon and heard his request. He 
smiled, his auto guns folding back into their original positions. He 
advanced in a fighting stance and growled.  He really didn't like it when 
someone hurt his siblings, but to shoot a bot when he or she was unarmed was 
dishonourable, so he would instead pummel his foe into oblivion!*
* He flexed his claws and advanced slowly, ready for anything to come, but 
Irons voice cut like a knife through his concentration. She wanted him to 
retreat when this..this...creepy looking dude hurt his sister! Not a chance, 
he would fight till the other bot gave in, or he himself could no longer 
fight!*

*Shadow Cat saw that Snow Tech was not going to back off, like Iron Ordered, 
but was going to fight. She groaned, this was not her day either. then it 
dawned on her. Snow Tech probally didn't know that she was O.k. She smiled, 
mabey there was a way to make him listen... Shge shouted out to him..*

" Snow Tech, back off! i'm alright, we have to go, IR's calling all of us to 
a seize fire! So that means STOP!!!"

* Snow Tech did stop, he turned and smiled at her with his most doofus grin 
he could manage, and turned back to Hurricane and spoke.*

" Yeah, i guess we gotta go, We'll finish this later. MAY THE WINDS OF FATE 
SMACK YOUR SQUARE ASS!"

*And with a goofy laugh, he and Shadow Cat departed from the battle feild to 
search for Iron Raptor.*
